body.p:
To his Excellency Thos. E. Bramblete
Gov of Kentucky
Your petitioners represent that Ephraim Gooden of Bath County was by a Judgement of the Bath Circuit Court rendered at the Term 18 fined sixty dollars for the offense of keeping a Tippling House

Your Petitioners represent that Mr Gooden is a man in indigent circumstances Has not been since the fine any way engaged in selling Spitituous liquors That In these times of trouble it is very dificult to meet even current expenses in a County infested with bands of Gurrillas

We therefore ask your Excellency to remit said fine
Dec 12th 1863

B D Lacy
Newtown Moreland
Thomas D Crow
James F Shouse
William A Vise
Edward Burnes
W T Gornett
Edgar Bearne
Theophers Hundit
Jno Miller
John J. Swetnam
Reuben Rogers
Jas Rogers
Dudley Messick

Bath County
Refused
Tho E Bramlette
